values: To ride something is to travel on it. You can ride an animal, a bike, etc.
I will ride a roller coaster for the first time today.
v.骑；乘

To ride is to sit on and control the movement of a vehicle or animal.
To ride means to travel on something, such as a vehicle or animal, by sitting on it.
verb, noun
骑
n. 骑；乘坐；交通工具；可供骑行的路；（乘坐汽车等的）旅行；乘骑；（乘车或骑车的）短途旅程；供乘骑的游乐设施,vi. 骑马；乘车；依靠；漂浮,vt. 骑；乘；控制；（骑马、自行车等）穿越；搭乘；飘浮
